author: antoine
msg: the method isMorePowerfulThanExcludes was returning false on org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs
in the run-tests target of our buildfile because of the exclude pattern :

author: antoine
msg: throw an exception if <exec/> is used with an attribute
which is incompatible with spawn and spawn=true.

author: antoine
msg: Some ftp servers have binary as default, so when binary is false
it is good to set explicitly the ascii mode for the transfer.
Problem reported by Michael Nebus (Michael dot Nebus at Pfizer dot com)
